forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city stirs beneath a canopy of partially clouded skies, gently illuminated by the encroaching light. With temperatures resting at a crisp low of 43, the morning air carries a refreshing bite that hints at the day ahead. Later, the sun will take center stage, warming the atmosphere to a pleasant high near 61, yet by afternoon, a slight dip in warmth will coax the thermometer back down to the cooler embrace of 57. The winds whisper softly from the north-northeast, adding only a gentle rustle to the morning’s calm.

For those pondering their activities, the clarity of the skyline suggests a day ripe for exploration—perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the shimmering bay mirrors the warming sun or a visit to one of the city’s many parks, where the flora awakens with vibrancy. Dress in layers that balance comfort against the cool morning and emerging warmth, perhaps a light sweater or jacket that can easily be shed as the sun climbs higher. With the marine layer holding at bay until later, today offers a picturesque backdrop for simple pleasures, transforming the ordinary into moments of quiet joy amidst the urban landscape.
